name: Solomon's Meal
steps: Make sure Solomon is asleep before preparing.
Create dish at least 50 metres away upwind.
Firstly create the gravy in a large bowl and mix in the bread.
Next make sure the meat is not moving
Mix all ingredients and place in a bowl.
Solomon will come get his food when's he wakes up.

name: Heimurldong's Feast
steps: Place timber in circle to hold all ingredients inside.
Next spread bread evenly inside the circle.
Place apples ontop of the bread, dipping in honey for adhesion.
Once all apples are placed, pour the rest of the honey on the ingredients.
Finally: Set alight and leave immediately.
